  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of RAG agents
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: "clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3"
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

input:
---
- name: Custom Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Agents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun  
  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of RAG agents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: "clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3"
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG agents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Create a RAG agent
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        agent_name: Lorenzo13 Charenton13
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - name: Update a RAG agent
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        agent_name: "Lorenzo8 Livigni8"
        method: UPDATE
      register: update_result

---
- name: Custom Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Agents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun  
  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of RAG agents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: "clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3"
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG agents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Create a RAG agent
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        agent_name: Lorenzo13 Charenton13
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - name: Update a RAG agent
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        agent_name: "Lorenzo8 Livigni8"
        method: UPDATE
      register: update_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: update_result.json_payload

    - name: Get a RAG agent by its ID
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

---
- name: Custom Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Agents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun  
  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of RAG agents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: "clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3"
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG agents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Create a RAG agent
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        agent_name: Lorenzo13 Charenton13
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - name: Update a RAG agent
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        agent_name: "Lorenzo8 Livigni8"
        method: UPDATE
      register: update_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: update_result.json_payload

    - name: Get a RAG agent by its ID
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the agent info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload

    - name: Delete a RAG agent by its ID
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        method: DELETE
      register: delete_result

---
- name: Custom Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Agents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun  
  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of RAG agents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: "clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3"
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG agents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Create a RAG agent
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        agent_name: Lorenzo13 Charenton13
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - name: Update a RAG agent
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        agent_name: "Lorenzo8 Livigni8"
        method: UPDATE
      register: update_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: update_result.json_payload

    - name: Get a RAG agent by its ID
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the agent info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload

    - name: Delete a RAG agent by its ID
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        method: DELETE
      register: delete_result

    - name: Display the delete agent result
output:
debug:
        var: delete_result.json_payload

---
- name: Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Documents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:

      rag_password_api: password
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun

  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of RAG documents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG documents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

input:
---
- name: Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Documents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_username_api: fabrice.livigni@free.fr
      rag_password_api: password
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun

  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of RAG documents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG documents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Get a RAG document by its ID
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_document_id: "{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the RAG document info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Create a RAG document
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_chunk_overlap: 150
        rag_chunk_size: 400
        rag_keep_files: false
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

  tasks:

---
- name: Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Documents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  vars_files:
    - my_module_defaults.yml
    
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document: "{{ my_module_defaults }}"

  tasks:

    - name: Get a list of RAG documents
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

- name: Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Documents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  vars_files:
    - my_module_defaults.yml
    
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document: "{{ my_module_defaults }}"

  tasks:

        rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf

input:
---
- name: Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Documents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  vars_files:
    - my_module_defaults.yml
    
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document: "{{ my_module_defaults }}"

  tasks:

    - name: Get a list of RAG documents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG documents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Get a RAG document by its ID
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_document_id: "{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the RAG document info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload

    - name: Create a RAG document
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_chunk_overlap: 150
        rag_chunk_size: 400
        rag_keep_files: false
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
output:
debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    # - name: Delete a RAG document by its ID
    #   ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
    #     rag_agent_id: "clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2"
    #     rag_document_id: "clxvyxb5c006077c1bw48gknj"
    #     method: DELETE
    #   register: delete_result

    # - name: Display the delete document result
    #   debug:
    #     var: delete_result.json_payload
